TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewColumn extends System.Windows.DependencyObject implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public Class GridViewColumn Inherits DependencyObject Implements INotifyPropertyChanged
type GridViewColumn = class inherit DependencyObject interface INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示显示数据的列。

span.span: Represents a column that displays data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个由视图模式中显示的数据列。A is used by the view mode to display a column of data. 实现视图模式为列提供数据。The that implements the view mode provides the data for the column. 使用数据绑定来指定数据。You use data binding to specify the data for the . 可以使用来定义要显示的列中的数据。You can use the to define the data to display in a column. 此外可以定义数据的一部分由指定属性。You can also define the data as part of a that is specified by the property. 如果不同的单元格具有不同对象，属性可指定。If different cells have different objects, the property can specify a . 以下列表显示在这里，优先级从高到低的其订单中提到的属性：The following list shows the properties mentioned here, in their order of precedence from highest to lowest: - - - 类还包含可用于定义和自定义列的列标题的属性。The class also contains properties that you can use to define and customize the column header for the column. 属性可以定义列标题的内容。The property can define the content of the column header. 其他属性，如和还可以指定内容和列标题样式。Other properties such as and can also specify content and style for the column header. 其中一些属性还上找到其他类如类。Some of these properties are also found on other classes such as the class. 有关用于定义样式和模板列标题，以及为这些属性优先顺序有关的信息的属性的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).For more information about the properties that are used to define styles and templates for column headers, and for information about the order of precedence for these properties, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 类实现 接口。The class implements the interface. 此接口提供的功能，如对属性值发生了更改时发生的事件订阅属性值。This interface provides the ability to subscribe to the events that occur when a change occurs to a property value, such as the property value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义对象的。The following example shows how to define objects for a . [!code-xaml[ListViewSnips#GridViewColumnContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumncontent)]

summary.span: 获取 的实际宽度。

span.span: Gets the actual width of a .
The current width of the column.
The default is zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性获取的当前宽度时属性设置为。You can use this property to get the current width of the when the property is set to . 值为为属性指定列大小适应不是列标题的最大可见项。A value of for the property specifies that the column size accommodate the largest visible item that is not the column header. 与不同，不是依赖项属性。Unlike , is not a dependency property.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示列单元格内容的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template to use to display the contents of a column cell.

value.span: 一个用于设置列单元格格式的 。

span.span: A that is used to format a column cell.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下属性都绑定到和显示列单元格的内容，并按其顺序从高到低的优先级，此处列出：The following properties all bind to and display the content of a column cell, and are listed here in their order of precedence, from highest to lowest: - - - ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法就从技术上讲，但不是建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 绑定引用使用，或者也是可行的但不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定要用于显示。The following example shows how to specify a to use to display a . [!code-xaml[ListViewTemplate#GridViewCellTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewTemplate/CS/window1.xaml#gridviewcelltemplate)] [!code-xaml[ListViewTemplate#CellTemplateProperty](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewTemplate/CS/window1.xaml#celltemplateproperty)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，用于确定在列中显示单元格时使用的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets a that determines the template to use to display cells in a column.

value.span: 一个 ，它为列单元格提供 选择。

span.span: A that provides selection for column cells.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下属性都绑定到和显示列单元格的内容，并按其顺序从高到低的优先级，此处列出：The following properties all bind to and display the content of a column cell, and are listed here in their order of precedence, from highest to lowest: - - - ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 一个类派生自实现实用的重写。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识选择器实现所请求的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该密钥是指派生类实现在实际的重写。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 你可以以编程方式添加的实例在作为资源的资源字典的类。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-xaml[ListViewSnips#GridViewColumnContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumncontent)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要为此列绑定到的数据项。

span.span: Gets or sets the data item to bind to for this column.

value.span: 在列中显示的指定数据项类型。

span.span: The specified data item type that displays in the column.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将数据从数据源复制到某一列的类型相关联，以便列将显示一组该类型的值。This property associates a type of data from a data source to a column so that the column displays a set of values of that type. 数据源对象的示例包括对象和对象。Examples of data source objects include objects and objects. 以下属性用于定义的内容和样式的列单元格，所有和它们的优先级，按从高到低顺序在此处列出：The following properties are all used to define the content and style of a column cell, and are listed here in their order of precedence, from highest to lowest: - `DisplayMemberBinding` （此属性）`DisplayMemberBinding` (this property) - - ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Header { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的标题的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the header of a .
The object to use for the column header.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为一个对象，只需`string`，或一个对象，它很复杂，比如具有嵌入内容。The property can be set to an object that is as simple as a `string`, or to an object that is as complex as a that has embedded content. 中的默认列标题视图模式为派生自的按钮设置样式和包含的相关内容作为其子级的属性。The default column header in a view mode is styled as a button that is derived from and that has the content of the property as its child. 若要指定列标题的模板，请参阅或属性说明。To specify a template for the column header, see the or property descriptions. 定义内容、 布局和列标题的样式属性位于多个相关的类，并且其中一些属性具有类似的功能或相同的。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found on many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values \<*HeaderContentObject*.../>\<*HeaderContentObject*.../> 单个元素。A single element. 此元素可以具有子元素，如果*HeaderContentObject*内容模型允许它们。This element can have child elements if the *HeaderContentObject* content model allows them. ## 示例Example 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumnproperties)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumnproperties)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumnproperties)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要用于 标头的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style to use for the header of the .

value.span: 用于定义列标题的显示属性的 。

span.span: The that defines the display properties for the column header.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和属性可以共同定义属性值和列标题内容的可视化树。The property and the property can together define property values and the visual tree for column header content. 属性还可以通过定义指定的可视化树。The property can also specify the visual tree by defining a . 用于定义内容、 布局和列标题的样式属性找到许多相关类和其中的某些属性具有类似的功能或相同的。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found in many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 当设置了样式时，则一些限制。When you set a style, some restrictions apply. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see the [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *StyleResourceKey**StyleResourceKey* 标识所请求的样式的键。The key that identifies the style being requested. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法就从技术上讲，但不是建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 绑定引用使用，或者也是可行的但不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义用于指定的列标题的显示属性。The following example shows how to define a that specifies display properties for a column header. [!code-xaml[ListViewTemplate#GridViewHeaderStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewTemplate/CS/window1.xaml#gridviewheaderstyle)] [!code-xaml[ListViewTemplate#GridViewColumnTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewTemplate/CS/window1.xaml#gridviewcolumntemplate)] 下面的示例演示如何定义，它通过使用定义显示属性。The following example shows how to define a that defines display properties by using a . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果， ，或属性设置，则将忽略此属性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 多个属性可用于指定列标题的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果设置多个属性，将使用具有最高优先级的属性的值格式的列标题。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以在几种类型上设置列的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 以下列表显示可用于设置列标题，按从最低到最高优先级的顺序排列的格式的属性：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果这两个属性和属性设置，属性优先。If both the property and the property are set, the property takes precedence. 之后或为指定，不能更改。After a or is specified for a , it cannot be changed. 您还可以通过指定定义的列标题显示作为的一部分。You can also define the display of a column header by specifying a as part of a . 定义内容、 布局和列标题的样式属性位于多个相关的类，并且其中一些属性具有类似的功能或相同的。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found on many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法就从技术上讲，但不是建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 绑定引用使用，或者也是可行的但不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定要用于显示标头的模板。The following example shows how to specify a template to use to display the header of a . The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果这两个属性和属性设置，属性优先。If both the property and the property are set, the property takes precedence. 定义内容、 布局和列标题的样式属性位于多个相关的类，并且其中一些属性具有类似的功能或相同的。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found on many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`，或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识选择器实现所请求的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该密钥是指派生类实现在实际的重写。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 你可以以编程方式添加的实例在作为资源的资源字典的类。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 从派生的类实现实用的重写。A class that derives from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

value.span: 默认值为 ，可自动根据非列标题的最大列项调整大小。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要获取确切宽度时此属性设置为，使用属性。To get the exact width when this property is set to , use the property. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 字符串表示形式值。String representation of a value. 这被解释为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不需要显式包括小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，值的`1`是可接受。For instance a value of `1` is acceptable. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 一个*双*值，上文所述跟以下单位声明字符串之一： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （默认值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1 中为 96px = =`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 为厘米;1cm==(96/2.54) px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px `Auto` 启用自动调整大小行为。Enables autosizing behavior. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumnproperties)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumnproperties)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumnproperties)]
